attributes.action: change the rules governing the avaliability of Blue badges for parents of disabled children under the age of 3.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The scottish executive has just recently changed the rules with regard to allowing parents with children under 3 who suffer from severe health problems to be able to receive a blue badge. We now ask that this rule is now applied in England and Wales.
